SELECT s.schedule_no , s.schedule_writer , s.work_member_name , s.schedule_start , s.schedule_end , s.schedule_title , s.schedule_location , s.schedule_detail_location , s.schedule_content , s.schedule_auth , s.create_date
, sm.schedule_member_email , sm.schedule_attend
, sc.schedule_cmt_no , sc.cmt_member_email , sc.cmt_writer , sc.schedule_cmt_content , sc.cmt_create_date FROM ( SELECT s1.schedule_no , s1.project_no , s1.schedule_writer , s1.schedule_start , s1.schedule_end , s1.schedule_title , s1.schedule_location , s1.schedule_detail_location , s1.schedule_content , s1.schedule_auth , s1.create_date , wm1.work_member_name FROM schedule s1 INNER JOIN workspace_member wm1 ON s1.schedule_writer = wm1.work_member_email WHERE wm1.work_no = #{workNo} ) s LEFT OUTER JOIN schedule_member sm ON s.schedule_no = sm.schedule_no LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT wm2.work_member_name cmt_writer , sc1.schedule_no , sc1.schedule_cmt_no , sc1.cmt_member_email , sc1.schedule_cmt_content , sc1.cmt_create_date FROM schedule_comment sc1 INNER JOIN workspace_member wm2 ON sc1.cmt_member_email = wm2.work_member_email WHERE wm2.work_no = #{workNo} ) sc ON s.schedule_no = sc.schedule_no WHERE s.project_no = #{projectNo} ORDER BY s.schedule_no DESC
